roleset.name: to formulate a theory, speculate
roleset.note: THEORIZE-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of vncls lecture-37.11-1. (from theorize.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: He theorized that in the eye cancer , an infant inherited a damaged copy of a gene from one parent and a normal copy from the other .
example.arg: that in the eye cancer , an infant inherited a damaged copy of a gene from one parent and a normal copy from the other
